caption: This photograph depicts a tranquil rural scene featuring a brown horse and a young white foal with brown patches. The foal is standing close to the horse, possibly its mother, in what appears to be a bonding or feeding moment. They are situated in a lush, open field dotted with yellow flowers, signifying a spring or summer season. To the right of the frame stands a solitary, small tree with a distinctively twisted trunk and full, green foliage, providing a striking visual contrast in shape and color to the relatively flat landscape. The background is a hazy blue sky, which suggests either early morning mist or a gentle fog. The overall composition, with the animals positioned slightly off-center to the left and the lone tree on the right, offers a balanced and peaceful rural imagery, inviting viewers to appreciate a moment of natural serenity and the beauty of wildlife interactions.
title: Mare nursing colt
